sentences.en: All too often they become enmeshed in deadening routines.
sentences.cn: 他们时常陷入枯燥的日常事务之中。

sentences.en: Books are often stacked in higgledy-piggledy piles on the floor.
sentences.cn: 书本经常乱七八糟地堆在地板上。

sentences.en: Eczema is a common skin complaint which often runs in families.
sentences.cn: 湿疹是一种常见的皮肤病，通常具遗传性。

sentences.en: food is scarce and more often than not they go hungry.
sentences.cn: 食物很少，他们经常挨饿。

sentences.en: He didn't always win the arguments, but he often was right.
sentences.cn: 他并非在争辩中总是能赢，但他经常是对的。

sentences.en: He was often caustic and mocking, or flew into rages.
sentences.cn: 他常常讽刺或挖苦人，有时又会大发雷霆。

sentences.en: How often do you see your parents?
sentences.cn: 你隔多久去看你父母？

sentences.en: I don't know how often I heard the same awful jokes.
sentences.cn: 这种千篇一律的烂笑话我不知道听过多少回了。

sentences.en: I had two homes really, because as often as not I was down at her house.
sentences.cn: 其实我有两个家，因为我常去她家里。

sentences.en: If a baby is thirsty, it feeds more often.
sentences.cn: 婴儿要是渴了，就会吃得更频繁。

sentences.en: If you wash your hair too often, it can get too dry.
sentences.cn: 如果洗头过勤，头发会变得干枯。

sentences.en: In the past this process of transition has often proven difficult.
sentences.cn: 过去这一过渡过程常常很艰难。

sentences.en: Like their children, parents are often defensive about their private lives.
sentences.cn: 就像子女一样，父母也常常很注重保护他们的私生活。

sentences.en: Lucilla often asks her sisters to retell the story.
sentences.cn: 露西拉经常要姐姐们把这个故事反复讲给她听。

sentences.en: No matter how often they turn up, their welcome never wears out.
sentences.cn: 不管他们多久露面一次，都永远那么受欢迎。

sentences.en: Robin is a difficult child; you’ve said so yourself often enough (= a lot of times ).
sentences.cn: 罗宾是个难管的孩子，你自己也常常这么说。

sentences.en: She often works at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 她周末经常要上班。

sentences.en: Students often travel hundreds of miles to get here.
sentences.cn: 学生常常赶数百英里的路来到这里。

sentences.en: Teachers often view youth workers as undisciplined and ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 老师们常认为青少年工作者纪律性差且能力低下。

sentences.en: These expressions are often used interchangeably, but they do have different meanings.
sentences.cn: 这些表达方式经常相互替代使用，但它们的含义却有所不同。

sentences.en: Too often he only absorbs half the information in the manual.
sentences.cn: 他对于说明书上所说的经常是一知半解。

phrases.tran_cn: 最经常；很多时候；通常来说

trans.tran_en: if something happens often, it happens regularly or many times
if something happens often, it happens regularly or many times
